\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{metal\+\_\+xlnx\+\_\+irq\+\_\+init()}{metal\_xlnx\_irq\_init()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily int metal\+\_\+xlnx\+\_\+irq\+\_\+init (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{void}]{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



metal\+\_\+xlnx\+\_\+irq\+\_\+int 

Xilinx interrupt controller initialization. It will initialize the metal Xilinx I\+RQ controller data structure.

\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
0 for success, or negative value for failure 
\end{DoxyReturn}
